name: q5.js
description: [q5 fork] p5.js small & fast alternative (experimental) implementation.

scripts.build: find src/ -name '*.js' -exec sh -c 'terser "$1" -o dist/"$(basename "$1" .js).min.js" --compress --mangle' _ {} \;; cp dist/q5.min.js docs/js/q5.min.js; node generate-docs.js
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
